title: Middle Mobile & Backend Developer
description:
Led the end-to-end development of 3 production-level applications over 1 year and 10 months, evolving from initial exploration to implementing advanced modular architectures.

Key Technical Contributions:

* **Mobile Mastery (Flutter & Riverpod):** Architected apps using Clean Architecture and Modular patterns. Implemented a robust data strategy combining State Management + Repository Pattern + Cache + Local Database (Hive/SQFLite) + REST API integration.

* **Advanced Backend (Django & AI):** Developed complex backend systems with a focus on automation. Integrated OpenAIâ€™s Whisper AI for voice processing, utilized Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) for models, and implemented Table Inheritance for optimized database structures.

* **Cloud & DevOps:** Executed seamless integrations with Cloud providers and Firebase services (Cloud Messaging, Analytics, Authentication). Managed the full release cycle, including handling Apple-specific requirements like APNs notifications and App Store deployment.

* **UI/UX Excellence:** Created custom animation engines and focused on high-fidelity design implementation, ensuring a premium user experience across all 3 production apps.

* **Evolution of Expertise:** Successfully transitioned from legacy development practices to modern, scalable software engineering standards, ensuring high performance and code maintainability.
